page.title: 04CHICHESTER-ST RICHARD'S
page.content: The hospital gives general, accident & emergency care for the 170000+ pop. of the {Chichester Health Authority}area. With the Broyle Road branch it has 573 beds for in-patient care & 4 operating theatres.Voluntary organizations play an important part in hospital life and the care of the large number of in and out patients seen each year. 1985 has seen the opening by Lord Cudlipp on March 18th of a Day Hospital for the elderly. It provides facilities for the assessment, medical treatment and rehabilitation of about 30 elderly patients who are brought by ambulance from their homes 2 or 3 times a week. {Chichester Hospital Radio }broadcasts 7 days per week to the patients.It is a voluntary organization that aims to make a patient's hospitalization a little more pleasant.Our group made a broadcast about the Domesday Project.
